flavorText: It's good to know more about your enemy's fate than your enemy does.

foreignData.name: Besiegeltes Schicksal
foreignData.text: Schaue Dir die obersten X Karten der Bibliothek eines Gegners Deiner Wahl an. Entferne eine dieser Karten ganz aus dem Spiel und lege die übrigen Karten in beliebiger Reihenfolge wieder auf die Bibliothek ihres Spielers.

name: Sealed Fate
originalText: Look at the top X cards of target opponent's library. Remove one of those cards from the game and put the rest back on top of that player's library in any order.

rulings.text: The controller of this spell decides the order of the cards on the library.

text: Look at the top X cards of target opponent's library. Exile one of those cards and put the rest back on top of that player's library in any order.
